title: University style? Modified?
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317160815im_/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_20140108_155016_236_3992.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317160815im_/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_20140114_082910_866_4126.jpg)

Please help me figure out what font this could be.

Thanks, J

Font: 

 Demonized 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317160815/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: jfeeney

comments.content: Most probably custom (and not a good one if you want my opinion) and from [City](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317160815/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/city-bq)?

**[Demonized](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317160815/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Demonized%20-%20Regular&fid=3ebe147325dcc4fd763b3f677784bd8b&fsize=60&text=ABBE%20S-TOWN&wrap=2)** by Rich Gast (2001, GreyWolf WebWorks, Free for personal use)
Nice catch, Fivos! Didn't know this one... Which looks (obviously) "based on" City... So be careful using Demonized, not sure it is totally legitimate...
